net.floodlightcontroller.core.internal

接口 IOFConnectionListener

  • 所有已知实现类:
    OFSwitchHandshakeHandler

    public interface IOFConnectionListener

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void connectionClosed(IOFConnectionBackend connection) 
      boolean isSwitchHandshakeComplete(IOFConnectionBackend connection) 
      void messageReceived(IOFConnectionBackend connection, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage m) 
      void messageWritten(IOFConnectionBackend connection, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage m)
      Primarily for role requests, we need a way to tell the OFSwitchHandshakeHandler that we've just sent a message (from e.g. a module).

    • 方法详细资料

      • connectionClosed

        void connectionClosed(IOFConnectionBackend connection)

      • messageReceived

        void messageReceived(IOFConnectionBackend connection,
                   org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage m)

      • messageWritten

        void messageWritten(IOFConnectionBackend connection,
                  org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage m)
        Primarily for role requests, we need a way to tell the OFSwitchHandshakeHandler that we've just sent a message (from e.g. a module). In this way, it'll list the request as pending and be able to receive and process the reply from messageReceived() later when the reply with the correct XID comes in. This will ensure the OFSwitchHandshakeHandler is always in the correct state.
        参数:
        connection -
        m -

      • isSwitchHandshakeComplete

        boolean isSwitchHandshakeComplete(IOFConnectionBackend connection)
